overview_of_class: Discrete probability spaces, combinatorial problems, random variables, moments, special distributions, joint distributions, independence, and conditional probability. Weak Law of Large Numbers and Central Limit Theorem (CLT).
name: Probability and Stochastic Processes
title: WCAS MATH 310-1-31 Probability and Stochastic Processes

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Discrete probability spaces, combinatorial problems, random variables, moments, special distributions, joint distributions, independence, and conditional probability. Weak Law of Large Numbers and Central Limit Theorem (CLT).

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
ISBN: 978-0321794772
A First Course in Probability Theory, 9th ed
Sheldon Ross
Pearson

descriptions.name: Class Notes
descriptions.value:
Students may not receive credit for both 311-1 and any of 314, 383, 385, EECS 302, IEMS 202, or STAT 320-1.

Currently, students only need to register for the lecture sections and not the discussion sections.

subject: MATH
